name: Pikaa Pikaachuuu
description:
How to Play:

1. For the main menu, use the mouse to click on the buttons. The PLAY button, restart the game completely, but the load game start from where you left and saved.

2. The player character move using WASD or the Arrow key.

3. You can Pause the Game by clicking on the pause Icon on the top right.

4. Once in the battle scene, you use the Arrow key to navigate between the different selections. You press "Z" to select and "X" to return back to the different options.

5. All your pokemons have different abilities with one special ability. 

Hack: Use the pokemon with the highest level in your pokemon list.

Credits:

1. Amer Ali Mohammed - Did the Main Menu, Pause, camera follow and sounds

2. Salick Talhah - Did the Battle Scene, the encounter, the player controller and Pokemon logics, Battle Logic, Special abilities. and Battle UI, Save system.

Devlog:
